mapper.sql:
SELECT sprm_pk, sprm_prmt_pk, sprm_prmt_dep_pk, sprm_tpsp_pk , prmt_parametro , spvr_pk, spvr_fini, spvr_ffin
, (CASE WHEN tppr_es_i18n = 1 THEN ( SELECT p18n_texto FROM tbl_parametro_i18n_p18n WHERE p18n_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND p18n_idioma = 'es_ES' ) WHEN tppr_tpdt_pk IS NOT NULL THEN ( SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = tppr_tpdt_pk ) END) as prmt_texto
FROM ( SELECT sprm_pk , sprm_prmt_pk , sprm_prmt_dep_pk , sprm_tpsp_pk , prmt_parametro , tppr_pk, tppr_es_i18n, tppr_tpdt_pk
, (SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = sprm_prmt_dep_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) ) AS prvr_pk
, spvr_pk , spvr_fini , spvr_ffin FROM tbl_subparametro_sprm sprm JOIN tbl_subparametro_version_spvr spvr ON spvr_sprm_pk = sprm_pk JOIN tbl_parametro_prmt ON prmt_pk = sprm_prmt_dep_pk JOIN tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr ON tppr_pk = prmt_tppr_pk
) sql
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_subparametro_sprm sprm JOIN tbl_subparametro_version_spvr spvr ON spvr_sprm_pk = sprm_pk
mapper.select: ORDER BY sprm_prmt_pk, sprm_tpsp_pk, prmt_parametro, spvr_fini DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_subparametro_sprm JOIN tbl_subparametro_version_spvr ON spvr_sprm_pk = sprm_pk WHERE sprm_prmt_pk = #{prmtId} AND sprm_prmt_dep_pk = #{prmtAsociado.id} AND ( ( #{spvr.finicio} BETWEEN spvr_fini AND COALESCE(spvr_ffin, portico.getSysDatetime()) ) OR ( COALESCE(#{spvr.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, portico.getSysDatetime()) BETWEEN spvr_fini AND COALESCE(spvr_ffin, portico.getSysDatetime()) ) OR ( #{spvr.finicio} <= spvr_fini AND COALESCE(#{spvr.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, portico.getSysDatetime()) >= COALESCE(spvr_ffin, portico.getSysDatetime()) ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_subparametro_sprm (sprm_pk, sprm_prmt_pk, sprm_prmt_dep_pk, sprm_tpsp_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{prmtId}, #{prmtAsociado.id}, #{entiId})
